section.name: Sandbox
section.p: The Sandbox is where Avaloners play with radical new ideas that result in long "random thought" [RT] email threads and a few flame wars. If you want to see what's on the bleeding edge of Avalon development, check out the avalon-sandbox module from CVS.

tr.td: A C# implementation of the Avalon framework
An AltRMI exporter for Merlin components
Phoenix block for embedded web/servlet containers
